unnormalised: IIT Delhi announces cut-off for B.Tech programs! The first list, released yesterday 27/05/2024, shows a slight increase compared to last yr. Computer Science saw a closing rank of 150 for the general category. Good luck to all those who applied!
normalised: I-I-T Delhi announces cut-off for B-Tech programs! The first list, released yesterday twenty seventh May two thousand and twenty four, shows a slight increase compared to last year. Computer Science saw a closing rank of one hundred and fifty for the general category. Good luck to all those who applied!

unnormalised: Students are rushing to prepone their travel plans to Delhi after the results were announced. Many are checking if they can get a seat in Round 2. Remember that the counseling fees are Rs. 15000 and non-refundable. BTW, congratulations to all those who made it!
normalised: Students are rushing to prepone their travel plans to Delhi after the results were announced. Many are checking if they can get a seat in Round two. Remember that the counseling fees are rupees fifteen thousand and non-refundable. B-T-W, congratulations to all those who made it!

unnormalised: Sources say that 85% of the seats were filled up in the 1st round itself. Keep an eye out for the next list which will be out by 05/06/2024. Details are on the official website iitd.ac.in. All the best to the aspirants!
normalised: Sources say that eighty five percent of the seats were filled up in the first round itself. Keep an eye out for the next list which will be out by fifth June two thousand and twenty four. Details are on the official website iitd dot a-c dot in. All the best to the aspirants!
